Class Maps

java.lang.Object
Maps
Direct Known Subclasses:
StormveilCastle
public class Maps extends Object
Class to facilitate map traversal, map loading, and manage map rules. It allows players to move around the game world, encounter enemies, find items, and interact with various tiles.

  • Constructor Details

    • Maps

      public Maps(String[][][] tileMap, int playerRoom, int playerRow, int playerCol, int areaIndex)
      Constructor for creating map instances.
      Parameters:
      tileMap - The 3D array representing the map layout.
      playerRoom - The initial room of the player.
      playerRow - The initial row of the player.
      playerCol - The initial column of the player.
      areaIndex - The index of the current area or map.

  • Method Details

    • getUnlockedFastTravelTiles

      public ArrayList<String> getUnlockedFastTravelTiles()
      Returns:
      ArrayList returns the arraylist of unlocked fast travel tiles so that the compiler can detect when a fast travel tile is accessible

    • printCurrentRoom

      public void printCurrentRoom()
      Prints the current room layout with the player's position.

    • movePlayer

      public void movePlayer(String direction)
      Moves the player on the map according to the given direction.
      Parameters:
      direction - The direction in which the player should move.

    • play

      public void play(Scanner sc)
      Initiates the game loop for map traversal and interaction.
      Parameters:
      sc - The scanner object to accept user input.

    • spawnTile

      public void spawnTile(int areaIndex)
      Handles the mechanics when a player steps onto a spawn tile.
      Parameters:
      areaIndex - The index of the current area.

    • bossTile

      public Boss bossTile(int areaIndex)
      Handles the mechanics when a player steps onto a boss tile.
      Parameters:
      areaIndex - The index of the current area.
      Returns:
      Boss The instantiated boss.
